passive.name: Promise
passive.description: Increases the wearer's CRIT Rate by <orangeStrong>{{1, percent}}%</orangeStrong>. While the wearer is in battle, for every {{3, percent}}% CRIT DMG that exceeds {{2, percent}}%, the DMG dealt by follow-up attack increases by <orangeStrong>{{4, percent}}%</orangeStrong>. This effect can stack up to {{5}} time(s). When the battle starts or after the wearer uses their Basic ATK, enables the DMG dealt by Ultimate or follow-up attack to ignore <orangeStrong>{{6, percent}}%</orangeStrong> of the target's DEF, lasting for {{7}} turn(s).
